name: Tools o'Plenty
description:
<<!PLEASE NOTE THAT I AM CURRENTLY WORKING ON THIS GAME A CURRENT STATE SHOULD BE CONSIDERED AS A FEATURE DEMO!>>

I am currently working on a game which would be a sandbox blacksmithing game.
In this game you would be able to create tools or weapons from various materials and then sell them in your own shop.

However it is currently in very early stage of developement where little to none of intended features can be shown.
If you are interested though you can download current version and see progress of this game yourself.

I would like to continue developing this game and have some feedback on what can be improved.
